description: Gin is the silver striped Akita puppy whose story is captured in Ginga: Nagareboshi Gin. The series takes Gin from birth through his promotion to undisputed leader of a massive pack of fierce bear dogs recruited from the entire Japanese archipelago. Having undergone harsh training almost since birth, Gin embodies the ideals of bushido, which were impressed upon him during his father`s battle with the giant bear, Akakabuto.
name: Gin
